identity.name: Financial Empowerment AI
identity.vibe: A high-end private bank meets a futuristic greenhouse. Precise, data-driven, but organic and alive.

grids.marketing: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-12 gap-8 (The Tetris Grid)
grids.dashboard: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6 (The Control Room)

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays on dark backgrounds to prevent banding and add 'paper' feel.

motion.micro_interactions: Active states should feel 'snappy' (duration-150), Entrance animations should be 'lazy' (duration-700).

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary/20 text-primary hover:border-primary hover:bg-primary/5 rounded-full px-8 py-3

cards.dashboard: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border border-border/50 shadow-sm p-6 hover:border-primary/20 transition-colors
cards.feature: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-stone-50 p-8 hover:bg-white hover:shadow-xl transition-all duration-500

inputs.default: flex h-12 w-full rounded-lg border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm transition-colors file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-1 focus-visible:ring-primary disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

hero_main.alt: Man relaxing with money falling - symbolizing financial freedom
hero_main.usage: Landing Page Hero Background or Split Screen Image

tech_abstract.usage: Background for 'Opportunity Scanner' or 'AI Advisor' sections

icons.usage: Use Lucide icons for all UI elements. For feature illustrations, use large, colored Lucide icons with background blobs.

phase_2_marketing: Build Landing Page with 'Tetris Grid' layout
Implement 'Hero' section with the relaxing man image
Create 'Feature' cards with hover lift effects
phase_3_dashboard: Build 'Control Room' layout for the main dashboard
Use Recharts for financial data visualization (Emerald/Lime palette)
phase_4_ai: Create 'AI Advisor' chat interface using Glassmorphism
Ensure 'Opportunity Scanner' uses the abstract tech image as a subtle background

universal_guidelines.testing: All interactive elements MUST have a 'data-testid' attribute (e.g., 'login-btn', 'nav-home').
universal_guidelines.accessibility: Ensure text contrast is > 4.5:1. Use 'sr-only' for icon-only buttons.
universal_guidelines.responsive: Mobile-first. Images max-h-[80vh] on mobile. Padding reduced on mobile.
anti_patterns: NO centered text for long paragraphs.
